WorkItem.Description:
The list of default Open ID providers listed on the Login screen does not include Facebook or Google. It would be nice if these and other popular Open ID providers (Yahoo, maspace etc.) could be added to the list.

Also I see the code is using ID Selector (www.idselector.com), do you plan to upgrade to RPX (rpxnow.com)?
WorkItem.Summary: Upgrade open ID provider to include Facebook, Google etc.

Comments.Message:
I am new to OpenID stuff, so could you please clarify the difference between rpx and idselector?
And regarding the updating the list of open id providers, I will check that out and see if we can do that soon.

I check rpxnow, but the free version is limited to 6 providers! beside there is no way Out of the box to type down other openid provider url as I noticed. so I think idselector is fitting and good choice for now.
I will manage to add google soon, but not sure about facebook

I am thinking to switch to openid-jquery selector http://code.google.com/p/openid-selector/
It is used in StackOverflow and it seems to be easy to work with and customize to include new providers
Personally I don't vote switching to RPXnow because it is commercial service and the free version is very limited.
